br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.data
Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
  br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.data.DataManager

public class DataManager
extends java.lang.Object

The main class for dealing with I/O operations, including i18n. It uses JSON as its data notation.

Constructor Summary
DataManager()
           
DataManager(java.lang.String language)
          The constructor instantiates the FileHandle objects and retrieves all informations from the files, so that most of the processing can happen here.

Constructor Detail

DataManager

public DataManager()

DataManager

public DataManager(java.lang.String language)
The constructor instantiates the FileHandle objects and retrieves all informations from the files, so that most of the processing can happen here. There should be only one instance of DataManager for the entire application.

Parameters:
language - The language to write/recover the files from. The currently supported languages are en_us and pt_br.
Method Detail

changeLanguage

public void changeLanguage(java.lang.String language)

retrieveProfiles

public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Profile> retrieveProfiles()
                                                       throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
Gets the profiles from a file. If the file doesn't exist, it will create one. Since profiles is the only dynamic data, that is, it is possible to modify and create profiles throughout the game, this method may be called multiple times.

Throws:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.

writeProfile

public void writeProfile(Profile newProfile)
                  throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
Saves a profile to a file ("data/data_profiles.json").

Parameters:
profile - The profile to be saved.
Throws:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.

retrieveEffects

public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Effect> retrieveEffects()
                                                     throws com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException
Gets all effects from a file. This should only be invoked once, and by the object itself; other objects should use the getEffectList() method instead.

Returns:
An Array object.
Throws:
com.badlogic.gdx.utils.SerializationException - An error while reading or writing an object.
See Also:
getEffectList().
